unauthorized.title: Unauthorized
unauthorized.detail: Authentication credentials were not provided or are invalid.

unprocessable_entity.title: Unprocessable Entity
unprocessable_entity.detail: The request was well-formed but was unable to be followed due to semantic errors.

expired_api_key.title: Expired API Key
expired_api_key.detail: The provided API key has expired. Please obtain a new API key.

invalid_api_key.title: Invalid API Key
invalid_api_key.detail: The provided API key is invalid. Please check your API key and try again.

invalid_origin.title: Invalid Origin
invalid_origin.detail: The request origin is not allowed. Please check your request origin.

invalid_ip.title: Invalid IP Address
invalid_ip.detail: The request IP address is not allowed. Please check your request IP address.

login_bad_credentials.title: Login Failed
login_bad_credentials.detail: The provided credentials are invalid. Please check your username and password.

oauth_user_already_exists.title: User Already Exists
oauth_user_already_exists.detail: An account with this email already exists. Please log in or use a different email.

validation_error.title: Validation Error
validation_error.max_length: The field '{field}' must be at most {max_length} characters.

internal_server_error.title: Internal Server Error
internal_server_error.detail: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

not_found.title: Not Found
not_found.detail: The requested resource could not be found.

bad_request.title: Bad Request
bad_request.detail: The request could not be understood by the server due to malformed syntax.

forbidden.title: Forbidden
forbidden.detail: You do not have permission to access this resource.

login_user_not_verified.title: User Not Verified
login_user_not_verified.detail: Your account has not been verified. Please check your email for the verification link.

reset_password_invalid_password.title: Invalid Password
reset_password_invalid_password.detail: The provided password does not meet the required criteria. Please ensure it is at least 8 characters long and contains a mix of letters, numbers, and special characters.

reset_password_bad_token.title: Invalid Reset Token
reset_password_bad_token.detail: The reset token is invalid or has expired. Please request a new password reset.

verify_user_already_verified.title: User Already Verified
verify_user_already_verified.detail: Your account is already verified. You can log in now.

verify_user_bad_token.title: Invalid Verification Token
verify_user_bad_token.detail: The verification token is invalid or has expired. Please request a new verification email.

update_user_email_already_exists.title: User Email Already Exists
update_user_email_already_exists.detail: The email address you are trying to use is already associated with another account. Please use a different email address.

update_user_invalid_password.title: Invalid Password
update_user_invalid_password.detail: Password must be at least 8 characters long.
